episode: I caused a car accident involving multiple parties due to carelessness. I felt very guilty about it.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I caused a car accident involving multiple parties due to carelessness. I felt very guilty about it. The other parties involved were so forgiving which honestly didn't make me feel less guilty.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's understandable to feel guilty, but their forgiveness shows great kindness. Have you tried forgiving yourself?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have tried but I still feel guilty thinking about the whole situation. What are some things I can do to alleviate this guilt?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Consider talking to someone about it or doing something positive for others.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I've actually done quite a bit of both. My wife has been very supportive.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's wonderful to hear. Keep leaning on her support.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: She can only do so much though!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I understand. Maybe professional help could assist you further?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I think that could do me some good. I feel some guilt for the financial consequences of the crash. My family was affected.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's tough when family is impacted. Seeking help could ease the burden.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Could you provide some help?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can listen and support you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's comforting. It has been one whole year since the crash. I was just not paying attention. Would you like to hear about the crash?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm here to listen if you want to share.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I rear ended someone while I was distracted and it caused a chain reaction.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really overwhelming.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was but honestly I'm grateful no one was seriously injured.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a relief.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah and the people I hit couldn't have been nicer.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really kind of them.
